text: Pectinodonta is a genus of sea snails, the true limpets, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Pectinodontidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Pectinodonta include: * Pectinodonta marinovichi Marshall, 1998 * Pectinodonta maxima (Dautzenberg, 1925) * Pectinodonta rhyssa (Dall, 1925) ==References== Category:Pectinodontidae
title: Pectinodonta
